Package org.yajasi.JungleJepps.ui

This package manages the User Interface and the connection between the user and services that Jungle Jepps provides.

NewJFrame  
OnChange This class can listen on various Java Swing elements for changes in value when the focus is lost.
Save This class is used to set a field element to save when changed.

Package org.yajasi.JungleJepps.ui Description

This package manages the User Interface and the connection between the user and services that Jungle Jepps provides.
